thread.title: Walmart, Target, Best Buy roll out Black Friday deals
thread.title_full: Walmart, Target, Best Buy roll out Black Friday deals - Nov. 10, 2016

posts.author: Jill Disis
posts.title: Walmart, Target, Best Buy roll out Black Friday deals
posts.text:
The best (or worst) brawls of Black Friday 2015 Walmart, Target and Best Buy have rolled out their Black Friday plans. Both Walmart and Target will open their doors at 6 p.m. on Thanksgiving Day. Best Buy stores will open an hour earlier at 5 p.m. Best Buy will also close at 1 a.m. early Friday and reopen at 8 a.m. 
All three major retailers are also announcing expanded plans for digital and in-store deals. 
Walmart says the majority of its Black Friday deals will be available on its website starting at 12:01 a.m. ET on Thanksgiving. It's advertising HDTVs from $125 to $398, drones for as little as $30 and more than 750 DVDs and Blu-ray movies starting at $1.96. 
Related: Amazon to customers: Start shopping 
Best Buy is offering hundreds of dollars in savings on Macbook Airs and DSLR cameras. The company is also selling video games for less than $30 and the Fitbit Charge 2 for less than $130, savings of $30 and $20, respectively. 
Target, meanwhile, is offering a selection of deals through Thursday, including 30% off shoes and 25% off Apple TV models. The company says it is also bringing back its 10 Days of Deals and Black Friday Presale promotions. 
  11:35 AM ET

thread.title: Best Black Friday deals at Walmart 2016 - CNET
thread.title_full: Best Black Friday deals at Walmart 2016 - CNET

posts.author: Ty Pendlebury
posts.title: Best Black Friday deals at Walmart 2016 - CNET
posts.text:
1 of 14 Best Black Friday deals at Walmart 2016 From gaming consoles to iPads to TVs these are the best deals from the Walmart Black Friday sale. Read Less Best deals at Walmart 
Walmart will open its doors at 6 p.m. on Thanksgiving, November 24, while the website will be available all day. Be aware that some of the deals are in-store exclusives. Published: November 13, 2016 9:43 AM PST Photo by: Screenshot: Ty Pendlebury/CNET / Caption by: Ty Pendlebury Samsung UN60KU6270 
A few years after the introduction of 4K its ubiquity among TV models is almost complete. The Samsung UN60KU6270 (originally $1099) is a 60-inch LCD which offers a 4K resolution and smart TV. It's available on Black Friday for $648 . Published: Caption by: Ty Pendlebury Sony PlayStation 4 Slim 500GB Uncharted 4 Edition 
While the "Slim" PS4 debuted in September at $299 Walmart has the console for $250 and throw in a copy of the latest/last Nathan Drake adventure Uncharted 4 . It's available in store only from 6 p.m.

thread.title: The best Black Friday deals on fitness trackers and smartwatches - CNET
thread.title_full: The best Black Friday deals on fitness trackers and smartwatches - CNET

posts.author: Dan Graziano
posts.title: The best Black Friday deals on fitness trackers and smartwatches - CNET
posts.text:
1 of 14 The best Black Friday deals on fitness trackers and smartwatches Best Buy, Target, Walmart and other retailers are offering great discounts on many popular fitness trackers and smartwatches. These are the best deals. Read Less Apple Watch Series 1 
Target has the Apple Watch Series 1 starting at $198 (down from $269). This is a great deal, but note that the Series 1 doesn't include GPS and it isn't swimproof. 
The next best deal is from Best Buy, which will have the Series 1 starting at $219 (down from $269).

thread.title: The best Black Friday TV deals from Walmart, Best Buy, and more
thread.title_full: The best Black Friday TV deals from Walmart, Best Buy, and more - The Verge

posts.author: Chaim Gartenberg
posts.title: The best Black Friday TV deals from Walmart, Best Buy, and more
posts.text:
While Black Friday sees deals on almost anything you could ever want to buy, be it an upgraded phone or a new pair of jeans, the iconic big score for more people is a new TV, with stores slashing prices on tons of models. And while sometimes these tend to be budget versions of better models, or companies trying to clear out years-old stock, there also are some good deals out there, too. Sorting through everything to find the best options is a chore, and you’ve got better things to do this holiday season.
So whether you’re looking to make the leap to 4K, upgrade to a smart TV, or just get a bigger and better set, we’ve combed through the stacks of ads to find the very best deals on TVs for you this Black Friday.
(Note: We try to list the “regular” price of an item, which is usually the MSRP — manufacturer’s suggested retail price. The actual going rate of a particular model may be far below that, so it never hurts to comparison shop.) 
Best Buy 
Toshiba 49-inch 4K TV with Google Cast for $199.99, in store only (usually $449.99) LG 50-inch 4K Smart TV for $399.99 (usually $649.99) Samsung 55-inch LED 4K TV for $479.99 (usually $799.99) LG 60-inch LED 4K Smart TV for $599.99 (usually $999.99) Sony 55-inch 4K HDR Smart TV for $899 (usually $1,199.99) Samsung 55-inch 4K HDR Smart TV for $997.99 (usually $1,399.99) Vizio 70-inch 4K TV with Google Cast for $999.99 (usually $1,299.99) Sony 65-inch 4K HDR Smart TV for $1,399 (usually $1,799.99) Samsung 65-inch 4K HDR Smart TV for $1,497.99 (usually $1,899.99) Walmart 
Samsung 50-inch 4K Smart TV for $398 Samsung 60-inch 4K Smart TV for $648 Philips 55-inch 4K LED Smart TV for $298 Vizio 60-inch 1080p TV for $398 Element 50-inch 1080p HDTV for $225 Hisense 40-inch 1080p HDTV for $125 Hitachi 65-inch 4K HDTV for $599 Target 
Hisense 50-inch 4K UHD TV for $249.99 (usually $499) Samsung 50-inch 4K UHD TV for $397.99 (usually $749.99) LG 55-inch 4K UHD TV for $499.99 (usually $799.99) Samsung 55-inch curved 4K UHD TV for $697.99 (usually $1,099.99) Samsung 60-inch 4K UHD TV for $697.99 (usually $1,199.99) Dell 
LG 43-inch 4K Smart TV with $30 Dell gift card for $299.99 (usually $449.99) Samsung 55-inch 4K Smart TV with $150 Dell gift card for $599.99 (usually $1,199.99) LG OLED 55-inch 4K Smart TV with LG BP155 Blu-ray Disc Player and $150 Dell gift card for $1,799.99 (usually $4,059.99) Sam's Club 
Vizio 50-inch 4K SmartCast TV for $348 (usually $419) Vizio 60-inch 4K SmartCast TV for $548 (usually $698) Vizio 70-inch 4K SmartCast TV for $928 (usually $1,198) Samsung 75-inch 4K smart TV for $1,998 (usually $2,599) Samsung 78-inch curved 4K smart TV for $3,498 — online only (usually $4,997.99) Newegg 
LG 49-inch 4K Smart TV for $399.99 (usually $549.99) LG 65-inch 4K Smart TV for $799.99 (usually $997) eBay 
Samsung 50-inch 4K TV for $399 (usually $1,049) Samsung UN55KS8000 55-inch 4K Smart TV for $997.99 (usually $2,199) Samsung UN55KS8000 65-inch 4K Smart TV for $1,497.99 (usually $3,499) Costco 
Vizio E50 50-inch 4K Smart TV for $389.99 (usually $599.99) Vizio M60 60-inch 4K Smart TV for $749.99 (usually $999.99) Samsung 65-inch curved 4K Smart TV for $899.99 (usually $1,099.99) LG 49-inch 4K Smart TV for $389.99 (usually $549.99) LG 65-inch 4K Smart TV for $779.99 (usually $997) (Affiliate links are automatically generated by our partner, Skimlinks. thread.title: The best Black Friday 2016 phone deals at Best Buy, Target, Walmart, and more
thread.title_full: The best Black Friday 2016 phone deals at Best Buy, Target, Walmart, and more - The Verge

posts.author: Jacob Kastrenakes
posts.title: The best Black Friday 2016 phone deals at Best Buy, Target, Walmart, and more
posts.text:
Smartphones don’t get the kind of eye-popping, fight-in-the-aisles quality deals that TVs do on Black Friday, but stores are still offering plenty of incentives to pick one up this weekend. For the most part, that means bundles on today’s top phones that don’t necessarily lower their price, but do end up giving you more for your money. Here’s the best of what we’ve spotted.
Walmart Buy “any” Apple or Samsung smartphone on a Verizon or AT&T installment plan, get a $250 Walmart gift card (note that “any” does not include Samsung’s Galaxy J3 or any phone that’s being sold at a discounted price)
Target Buy an iPhone 7 or 7 Plus on a Verizon, AT&T, or Sprint installment plan, get a $250 Target gift card
Buy a Galaxy S7 or S7 Edge on a Verizon, AT&T, or Sprint installment plan, get a $250 Target gift card and a Gear VR
Costco Buy a Galaxy S7 on a Verizon or AT&T installment plan, get a $200 Costco gift card (via mail-in rebate), two card mounts, a car charger, and a battery pack
Best Buy Buy a Galaxy S7 or S7 Edge on a Verizon, AT&T, or Sprint installment plan, get a $250 Best Buy gift card and a Gear VR
Buy an iPhone 7 or 7 Plus on a Verizon, AT&T, or Sprint installment plan, get a Best Buy gift card ($250 with 256GB model, $100 with 32GB and 128GB models)
Buy an LG G5 on a Verizon or Sprint installment plan, get a $300 Best Buy gift card
Moto Z Droid on a Verizon installment plan discounted to $240
AT&T Buy a Galaxy S7 or S7 Edge on an installment plan, get a Gear VR
Buy a Galaxy S6 on an installment plan, get a $200 Visa gift card
Buy any Samsung Galaxy phone on an installment plan, get a Gear S3 for $49.99 (two-year service plan required)
Verizon Google Pixel or Pixel XL with 32GB of storage for $240 and Pixel or Pixel XL with 128GB of storage for $360 (the catch: you have to pay $649.99 up front; the difference will be deducted from your wireless bill month to month over the next two years)
T-Mobile T-Mobile is mostly repromoting its existing trade-in deals
Sprint Buy a Galaxy S7 on an installment plan, get a free Galaxy S7 if you open a new line of service (unlimited service plan also required for at least one phone)
Buy a Galaxy S7 or S7 Edge , get a free Galaxy Tab E
Buy an LG V20 , get a free 43-inch 4K TV from LG (valued at $449)
Buy an LG G5 , get a free 32-inch 1080p LED TV from LG (valued at $199.99)
HTC HTC 10 for $499 (currently $539.99)
HTC One M9 for $300 (currently $379.99)
HTC One A9 for $275 (currently $320)
Motorola / Lenovo Moto Z Play Droid with Hasselblad True Zoom Moto Mod or Moto Insta-Share Projector Moto Mod for $457.99 (regularly $707.99)
Moto Z Droid with Hasselblad True Zoom Moto Mod or Moto Insta-Share Projector Moto Mod for $673.99 (regularly $923.99)
BlackBerry Priv for $299 (currently $348.99)
DTEK50 for $229 (regularly $299)
Apple Nothing has been announced yet, but Apple’s website says to check back on Friday. It sounds like there’ll be some sort of promotion, but don’t expect much — last year Apple skipped Black Friday altogether.
(Affiliate links are automatically generated by our partner, Skimlinks. For more information, see our ethics policy .)

thread.title: Cyber Monday 2016: The Best Deals at Amazon, Target, Walmart, and Best
thread.title_full: Cyber Monday 2016: The Best Deals at Amazon, Target, Walmart, and Best | Glamour

posts.author: Lynsey Eidell
posts.title: Cyber Monday 2016: The Best Deals at Amazon, Target, Walmart, and Best
posts.text:
Cyber Monday certainly has its advantages over Black Friday; namely, that you can score insane deals without getting out of your pajamas, waiting in lines, or battling the crowds. But the day still comes with its own shopping stresses, because there are a ton of sales throughout the world wide web—and even more people shopping them. This year, we did the dirty work for you and hunted down all the details on the very best cyber steals. Here's exactly what's going down (in price!) at Target, Walmart, Amazon, and Best Buy on Cyber Monday 2016. Happy shopping (and be sure to check out the very best fashion and beauty sales, while you're at it)!
WALMART
This year, Walmart is kicking off its Cyber Monday deals on Black Friday and have tripled their online product assortment from 8 million to nearly 23 million items. But since that's a lot of web surfing, here is a rundown on all the steals and deals. (The highlight: Fifty-percent off ALL Samsung HDTVs.)
Starting Friday, November 25
Samsung 60" 1080p HD Smart LED TV, $579 with $80 Walmart Gift Card ($1,120 savings) Google Home, $99 ($30 savings) Promark P70 VR Drone, $99 ($50 savings) Quadrone Hybrid Drone, $99 ($30 savings) Fujifilm Instax Mini 7S Instant Camera (includes Mini Film10pk), $49 – Walmart exclusive bundle Black + Decker Robotic Vacuum, $196 ($103 savings) – Walmart exclusive bObsweep bObi Pet Robotic Vacuum Cleaner, $249 ($83 savings) Polaroid Cube+ Action Camera with WiFi, $109.99 6V Spider-Man Speed Coupe, $79 ($70 savings) 6V Trolls Speed Coupe, $79 ($70 savings) Ozark Trail 28-Piece Premium Camping Combo Set, $149 ($50 savings) 55" My First Trampoline with Lightpad and Enclosure, $59 ($10 savings) Lifetime 44" Portable Adjustable Basketball System, $89 ($30 savings) Gold's Gym AbFirm Pro, $49 (savings of $30) Ozark Trail 30-Ounce Double-Wall, Vacuum-Sealed Tumbler, $9.74 Boots for the family starting at $14.88 Activewear for the family starting at $5 Denim for the family starting at $10 Starting Monday, November 28
Samsung HDTVs over 50 percent off MSRP Samsung 65" 4K Ultra HD LED Smart TV, $999 ($1,200 savings) VIZIO 50" 4K Ultra HD SmartCast Smart LED TV, $379.99 ($148 savings) Dell Inspiron 15 Gaming Edition Laptop PC, $999.99 ($300 savings) Call of Duty Dragonfly Drone with Camera, $89 ($10.99 savings) Drones from DJI, Parrot, Autel, Yuneed and more starting at $199 Nerf N-Strike MEGA Mastodon Blaster with Free Blaster, $51 ($28 savings) Sunglasses from Prada starting at $99.99, with other savings on brands like Ray-Ban, Gucci, Miu Miu, Cartier and more on Marketplace Watches from Michael Kors starting at $99.99, with other savings on brands like Omega, Movado and more on Marketplace Handbags from Rebecca Minkoff starting at $71, with other savings on brands like Michael Kors, Kate Spade, Fossil and more on Marketplace Boots from brands like Frye and UGG starting at $135 on Marketplace Outerwear for the family starting at $9 Diamond jewelry savings up to $3,000 TARGET
Target is offering 15% off site-wide and store-wide from Sunday, November 27 through Monday, November 28. And this year, Target is extending the discount to include all gaming consoles, iRobot vacuums, KitchenAid appliances, and all Apple products —including iPhone and Apple Watch. Target also has special Cyber Week deals that will run from November 27 to December 3. (The highlight? A KitchenAid stand mixer for more than 50 percent off.)
Starting Sunday, November 27
Samsung 43” Ultra HD TV, $399.99 plus $50 Target GiftCard ($200 savings) Free Xbox Live Gold three-month membership ($24.99 value) with purchase of Xbox One S 500GB console with Battlefield 1 digital download, $249.99 ($50 savings) Free $100 Target GiftCard with purchase of any Swagtron T1/T3 Hoverboard Up to 25 percent off K’NEX, Mega Bloks, Magformers, and select LEGO toys KitchenAid Professional 5-qt. Stand Mixer, $199.99 ($250 savings) iRobot Roomba 880 robotic vacuum, $449.99 ($150 savings) Save $10 when you spend $50 and save $25 when you spend $100 on trees, lights, décor, ornaments and more (offer available in-store and online) BEST BUY
Best Buy is honoring its Black Friday deals on Samsung televisions through Cyber Monday, but the highlight of Best Buy's sale? Serious savings on Apple products, including iPhones, iPads, and select Macbooks.
Starting Monday, November 28
iPhone 7 32GB for $1 and $100 off select Beats products with two-year activation on Verizon Save $100 on all iPad Pro 12.9-inch Save $200 on select MacBook models Free Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare Legacy Edition with PlayStation 4 Pro or PlayStation 4 Slim purchase Get a $400 Best Buy gift card, Gear VR and $50 Oculus gift card with a Samsung Galaxy S7 and S7 edge, on a Verizon or Sprint installment billing plan Google Home, $99.99 ($30 savings) Sharp 43-inch LED HDTV with Roku, $179.99 ($120 savings) LG 55-inch LED HDTV, $349.99 ($150 savings) Nikon D3400 Two Lens DSLR Camera Kit with free 32GB memory card, $499.99 ($500 savings) Sony A6000 Two Lens DSLR Camera Kit with free memory card and camera case, $699.99 ($350 savings) GoPro Hero5 Black: Get a free $35 Best Buy gift card and 64GB Sandisk extreme microSD card with purchase, $399.99 GoPro Hero Session: Get a free GoPro Handler, Sandisk 16GB microSD card, and GoPro head strap with purchase, $179.99 40 percent off all Nespresso HP 15.6-inch Intel Core i3 touch laptop, $299.99 ($100 savings) Asus 17.3-inch Laptop, $599.99 ($200 savings) – BestBuy.com only Save up to $110 on Sony Wireless Headphones Bose SoundTrue Around Ear Headphone, $99.99 ($80 savings) Bose QC20 In-Ear Headphones, $199.99 ($50 savings) HP 21.5-inch FHD Monitor, $59.99 ($60 savings) Philips Hue Starter Kit, $99.99 ($30 savings) Linksys Max-Stream AC5400 Router, $269.99 ($130 savings) AMAZON
Amazon is unveiling more than 75,000 sales this Cyber Monday—which means you can basically get anything you want (from toys, to electronics, to home appliances) at a discounted price. There will also be specific deals for Amazon Prime, Prime Now, and Alexa users (like Lightning Deals with 30 minutes of early access for Prime users). Here are just some of the highlighted deals.
Amazon Products
Amazon Echo, $139.99 ($40 savings) Echo Dot, $39.99 ($10 savings) Amazon Tap, $89.99 ($40 savings) Fire tablet, $33.33 ($16.66 savings) Fire HD 8 tablet, $59.99 ($30 savings) Kindle, $49.99 ($30 savings) Kindle Paperwhite, $99.99 ($20 savings) Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote, $29.99 ($10 savings) Electronics
50-inch 1080p LED TV, $145 50-inch 4K Ultra HD Smart TV, $249.99 Save $50 on PlayStation 4 Slim 500GB Console – Uncharted 4 Bundle Rif6 Mobile Projector + SoundCube, $245 Sony Extra Bass Bluetooth Headphones, $88 Sonos PLAY:1 Compact Wireless Smart Speaker, $149 Save up to 30% on select HP laptops HP Envy Wireless All-in-One Photo Printer, $49.99 Arlo 5-Camera Security System, $469 Nest Cam Indoor Security Camera, $163.98 Toys
Save up to 50% on select toys from Nerf, Play-Doh, Playskool, and more LINCOLN LOGS Centennial Edition Tin, $32.49 Save 48% on Shopkins Shoppies Juice Truck Save 40% on K’NEX Looping Light-Up Roller Coaster Building Set Free accessory set with purchase of Melissa & Doug kitchen Kitchen and Home
Save $99 on iRobot Roomba 960 or 980 Robotic Vacuum Cleaner Blendtec Total Blender, $239.99 Save 31% on BISSELL PowerLifter PowerBrush Upright Deep Cleaner Save 44% on select Black+Decker 18V Lithium Cordless 2-N-1 Stick and Hand Vacuum Vornado AVH10 Vortex Heater with Automatic Climate Control, $79.86 Save 15% on select SINGER Heavy Duty Sewing Machines Save 43% on Precious Moments, “Just Married” Bisque Porcelain Ornament $10 off $50 orders of select BLACK+DECKER, TEKTON, and STANLEY tools Sports
Save 40% on Segway One S1 Save up to 50% on select Callaway Golf Sets Save up to 63% on select NordicTrack Cardio Equipment Books
Save up to 85% on select Kindle books More from Glamour :
